title: Understanding Early Signs
text: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) often shows signs in early childhood. Parents and caregivers are usually the first to notice unusual behaviors.

title: Common Early Signs
text: Children with ASD may exhibit repetitive behaviors or have difficulty with social interactions. These signs can be observed as early as $$18$$ months.

hintAnswer: parents notice $$self-stimulating$$ behavior between $$18$$ months and $$2$$ years
title: Identifying Brian's Behavior
text: What behavior might Brian's parents notice that could lead to an ASD diagnosis?
choices: parents notice $$self-stimulating$$ behavior between $$18$$ months and $$2$$ years
he constantly asks questions to his parents
he engages with educators and interventionists
